price: 27. El Faraón dijo: «En verdad, este mensajero vuestro que os ha sido enviado ha perdido el juicio».
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
